Want to see how to get you add-on experience to show up here?

Check out the App Action Contribution Reference in the Jive Developer Community.

To build this add-on for yourself, simply:

  • Download the Jive Node SDK
  • Run the following command: jive-sdk create app
  • Deploy your Add-On to Jive.
    Note: ngrok - Is a very powerful tool for doing development in the cloud.
